title: Gano House Sibu
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, International, Organic, Juice bar, Malaysian
description: 瑞芝苑养生素餐厅 breakfast and lunch health cafe, serving coffee and tea enriched with the Ganoderma  mushroom known as reishi or lingzhi. Vegans be aware that the chocolate drink contains skim milk powder. Serves fresh vege/fruit juice blends. Wholesome soups, snacks, and entrees freshly made-in-house in an open kitchen, using organic rice and noodles, with no mock meats. Free Wi-Fi. Other branches located in Johor and Muar.
streetAddress: Lot 2, S/L 10, no. 21, 1st Floor, Lorong Wong King Huo 5
